globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.blob.core.windows.net; connect-src 'self' https://*.azurewebsites.net https://*.blob.core.windows.net; frame-ancestors 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self';
